statements: SELECT * FROM EdTechPlatform WHERE id = 1;
SELECT student_name, grade FROM EdTechPlatform WHERE grade > 90;
SELECT student_name, grade, assessment FROM EdTechPlatform WHERE grade BETWEEN 80 AND 90;
SELECT id, evaluation FROM EdTechPlatform WHERE student_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM EdTechPlatform WHERE assessment IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM EdTechPlatform WHERE grade > 90
SELECT student_name, grade FROM EdTechPlatform WHERE assessment = 'Midterm'
SELECT student_name, grade, assessment, evaluation FROM EdTechPlatform ORDER BY grade DESC
SELECT * FROM EdTechPlatform WHERE grade < 70 ORDER BY student_name ASC
SELECT * FROM EdTechPlatform WHERE assessment LIKE '%Final%'
SELECT * FROM Grades
SELECT student_id, grade, course_id FROM Grades WHERE student_id = 10
SELECT course_id, AVG(grade) AS avg_grade FROM Grades GROUP BY course_id
SELECT MAX(max_score) AS highest_score FROM Assessments
SELECT assessment_title, max_score FROM Assessments WHERE course_id = 5
SELECT * FROM Grades WHERE grade >= 80 ORDER BY student_id DESC;
SELECT student_id, AVG(grade) AS avg_grade FROM Grades GROUP BY student_id HAVING avg_grade >= 75;
SELECT * FROM Assessments WHERE max_score < 100 ORDER BY assessment_title ASC;
SELECT student_id, course_id, SUM(grade) AS total_grade FROM Grades GROUP BY student_id, course_id;
SELECT assessment_title, MAX(max_score) AS highest_score FROM Assessments GROUP BY assessment_title HAVING highest_score > 90;
SELECT * FROM grades;
SELECT student_id, subject, grade FROM grades WHERE grade >= 90;
SELECT id, assessment_name, max_score FROM assessments ORDER BY max_score DESC;
SELECT student_id, evaluator_id, evaluation_date, feedback FROM student_evaluations WHERE evaluator_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM grades WHERE subject = 'Math';
SELECT * FROM grades ORDER BY grade DESC;
SELECT student_id, AVG(grade) as average_grade FROM grades GROUP BY student_id;
SELECT subject, MAX(grade) as max_grade FROM grades GROUP BY subject;
SELECT * FROM student_evaluations WHERE evaluation_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT assessments.assessment_name, student_evaluations.feedback FROM assessments JOIN student_evaluations ON assessments.id = student_evaluations.id;
SELECT * FROM Grades
SELECT id, student_id, course_id, grade, created_at FROM Grades
SELECT course_id, student_id, grade FROM Grades WHERE grade > 80
SELECT * FROM Assessments WHERE max_score = 100
SELECT assessment_name, max_score, course_id FROM Assessments ORDER BY max_score DESC
SELECT course_name, instructor_name, start_date, end_date FROM Courses WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM Grades WHERE grade > 90 ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT course_name, instructor_name, start_date FROM Courses WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT student_id, assessment_name, max_score FROM Assessments WHERE max_score < 100 ORDER BY assessment_name ASC;
SELECT id, rating, student_id FROM StudentEvaluations WHERE rating BETWEEN 3 AND 4;
SELECT course_id, COUNT(*) AS total_grades FROM Grades GROUP BY course_id HAVING total_grades > 10;
SELECT * FROM students ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM students WHERE id = 1;
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM courses WHERE credits > 3;
SELECT id, student_id, grade FROM grades WHERE grade >= 80 ORDER BY grade DESC;
SELECT assessment_name, max_score FROM assessments WHERE due_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM assessments WHERE max_score > 90 ORDER BY due_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT students.first_name, students.last_name, courses.course_name FROM students JOIN courses ON students.id = courses.instructor WHERE students.dob BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '2000-12-31';

SELECT student_evaluations.evaluation_text, student_evaluations.evaluation_date, students.first_name FROM student_evaluations JOIN students ON student_evaluations.student_id = students.id WHERE evaluation_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY evaluation_date ASC;

SELECT courses.course_name, grades.grade, students.first_name FROM courses JOIN grades ON courses.id = grades.course_id JOIN students ON grades.student_id = students.id WHERE grades.grade >= 85 ORDER BY courses.course_name, grades.grade DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM assessments WHERE assessment_name LIKE '%Midterm%' AND max_score < 100;
